Package client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatIF
public class ClientController extends Object implements ChatIF
This class constructs the UI for a chat client. It implements the chat interface in order to activate the display() method. Warning: Some of the code here is cloned in ServerConsole
Version:
July 2000
Author:
François Bélanger, Dr Timothy C. Lethbridge, Dr Robert Laganière

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientController

      public ClientController(String host, int port)
      Constructs an instance of the ClientConsole UI.
      Parameters:
      host - The host to connect to.
      port - The port to connect on.

  • Method Details

    • accept

      public void accept(Message msg)
      This method waits for input from the console. Once it is received, it sends it to the client's message handler.

    • display

      public void display(String message)
      This method overrides the method in the ChatIF interface. It displays a message onto the screen.
      Specified by:
      display in interface ChatIF
      Parameters:
      message - The string to be displayed.

    • requestServerSearchForBooks

      public List<Book> requestServerSearchForBooks(String element, String value)
      Request Server to Search For Books Based on Element e.g. Searching for Books by name will be requestServerSearchForBooks("book_name", "Harry Potter") will return all books with the name "Harry Potter"
      Parameters:
      element - book_name, book_genre, book_description
      value - of element
      Returns:
      List<Book> Books

      public Object[] requestServerForBookListAvailibilityInfo(List<Book> bookList)
      Request Server to Return Availiblity+ClosestReturnDate for books in bookList
      Parameters:
      bookList -
      Returns:
      Object[] with Object[0]=List of availibility Object[1]=List of Closest Return Date

    • requestServerForBookAvailibilityInfo

      Parameters:
      book -
      Returns:
      Object[] List<boolean>, List<LocalDate>

      Returns:

    • requestServerToAddHistoryToSubscriber

      Parameters:
      dh - DetailedHistory (user can be null)
      historyId - int
      Returns:
      boolean success/fail

      public int requestServerWhetherBookIsReservable(Book book, int subscriberId)
      Request Server to check whether a book is reservable
      Parameters:
      book -
      subscriberId -
      Returns:
      int 0=nope, 1=yep, 2=already reserved by subscriber

      month -
      Returns:

    • getClientLastResponses

      public String[] getClientLastResponses()
      Get Last Responses from Server to Client if LastResponse = error, LastResponseError will have str value if LastResponse = msg, LastResponseMsg will have str value
      Returns:
      String[] with {LastResponse, LastResponseMsg, LastResponseError}
